content.webTitle: Hague avid reader of Guardian Unlimited Politics

fields.headline: Hague avid reader of Guardian Unlimited Politics
fields.bodyText: The cynical may suggest that there's little to separate the parties these days but today's gagfest in the chamber of the Commons proved that's really not true. Young Tottenham MP David Lammy boasted of reading that morning's Guardian. Young Tory leader, William Hague, went one better, revealing he not only reads the Guardian but checks www.theguardian.com/politics too. And unfortunately, on the David Lammy page it states he is not standing in Tottenham 2001. Mea culpa  a gremlin in our computer system was to blame. Good to know Conservative central office is checking the site though. As for our techies - we'll flog them later.
